title: Foxworth Friday: Lakers Owner Jeanie Buss Passive-Aggressively Tweeting LeBron?
description:
Bomani Jones and Domonique Foxworth discuss Lakers owner Jeanie Buss’ passive-aggressive tweet, and what it says about the tenure of star F LeBron James in Los Angeles thus far (10:02). Plus, what’s possible in the remaining years on James’ deal with the team (38:37), and why this offseason has the guys looking forward to the upcoming season in a different way than usual (1:00).
